name: Ext_R2_CarePlan_ac_de_category
title: Cross-version Extension for R2.CarePlan.activity.detail.category for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents CarePlan.activity.detail.category from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/CarePlan|1.0.2 for use in FHIR R4.

element.short: diet | drug | encounter | observation | procedure | supply | other
element.definition: High-level categorization of the type of activity in a care plan.
element.comment: `CarePlan.activity.detail.category` maps to R4 `CarePlan.activity.detail.extension`. To multiple elements in CarePlan: (`CarePlan.activity.detail.kind`, `CarePlan.activity.detail.extension`). Has no type mapping Changed from a single value to an array (max cardinality from 1 to *). So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget. `CarePlan.activity.detail.category` maps to R4 `CarePlan.activity.detail.kind`. To multiple elements in CarePlan: (`CarePlan.activity.detail.kind`, `CarePlan.activity.detail.extension`). Has no type mapping `kind` added a required value set binding to `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/care-plan-activity-kind|4.0.1`. So is mapped as RelatedTo.

element.short: diet | drug | encounter | observation | procedure | supply | other
element.definition: High-level categorization of the type of activity in a care plan.
element.comment: `CarePlan.activity.detail.category` maps to R4 `CarePlan.activity.detail.extension`. To multiple elements in CarePlan: (`CarePlan.activity.detail.kind`, `CarePlan.activity.detail.extension`). Has no type mapping Changed from a single value to an array (max cardinality from 1 to *). So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget. `CarePlan.activity.detail.category` maps to R4 `CarePlan.activity.detail.kind`. To multiple elements in CarePlan: (`CarePlan.activity.detail.kind`, `CarePlan.activity.detail.extension`). Has no type mapping `kind` added a required value set binding to `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/care-plan-activity-kind|4.0.1`. So is mapped as RelatedTo.

binding.description: High-level categorization of the type of activity in a care plan.
